text: The MRG-1 Ogonyok (МРГ-1 «Огонёк») is a Soviet remotely-controlled seven- barreled naval 55m grenade launcher adopted by the Soviet military in 1971. Its MRG-1 grenades are akin to miniature depth charges.http://www.pmulcahy.com/PDFs/heavy_weapons/grenade_launchers.pdf It has been replaced in the Russian military by the DP-65 grenade launcher, with ten tubes. ==Users== * * * ==See also== *DP-64 *DP-65 ==References== Category:Grenade launchers of the Soviet Union ru:МРГ-1 «Огонёк»
